entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening except southeast 40 near the water late this evening and overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 15 January 2023
